name: Bomb Shuffle (v2)
description:
[June 27, 2021: This is an updated version with a slightly better tutorial section. Feel free to give it a shot if you found the jam version too broken.]

Bomb Shuffle is a one-button (only can use your left mouse button) puzzle game. Use the arrows to control the highlighted zone that will detect bombs for you. Click on the boxes to set them to 

  • clear (a red X)
  • bomb (a green checkmark)
  • or unsure (a blue question mark)

After completing the tutorial missions, try the timed trials.

(Author's note: I don't have time to work on this project this weekend so the end is fairly rushed - including the medium levels not even really being tested. Hopefully the 5 tutorial and 5 easy missions will be enjoyable.)
